# <a name="print-email-calendars-and-attachments"></a><span data-ttu-id="262e0-102">Meilisõnumite, kalendrite ja manuste printimine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-102">Print email, calendars, and attachments</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="262e0-103">Meilisõnumi printimiseks Outlooki veebirakenduses tehke järgmist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-103">To print an email message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="262e0-104">Valige sõnum, mida soovite printida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="262e0-105">Valige sõnumi paremas ülanurgas kolm punkti ja seejärel valige **Prindi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots and then select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="262e0-106">Kalendri printimiseks tehke järgmist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-106">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="262e0-107">Valige lehe paremas ülanurgas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-107">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="262e0-108">**Print (Prindi**).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-108">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="262e0-109">Valige Vaade ja ajavahemik ning klõpsake nuppu **Prindi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-109">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="262e0-110">Manuse printimiseks tehke järgmist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-110">To print an attachment:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="262e0-111">Avage sõnum, mis sisaldab manust, mida soovite printida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-111">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="262e0-112">Viige kursor manuse kohale ja valige ikoon **Laadi alla**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-112">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **Download** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="262e0-113">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-113">.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="262e0-114">Kui fail on alla laaditud, avage see vastava programmiga ja valige printimiseks suvand.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-114">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="262e0-115">Näiteks Avage Wordis DOC-faili ja seejärel printige.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-115">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="262e0-116">Lisateavet leiate teemast [meilisõnumite, manuste ja kalendrite printimine Outlooki veebirakenduses](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="262e0-116">To learn more, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span></span>
